relationship.description: The nature of the relationship between a patient and the related person.

name.description: A name associated with the person.

telecom.description: A contact detail for the person, e.g. a telephone number or an email address.

address.description: Address where the related person can be contacted or visited.

gender.description: Administrative Gender - the gender that the contact person is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

organization.description: Organization on behalf of which the contact is acting or for which the contact is working.

period.description: Address where the related person can be contacted or visited.
